mainpagecard.title: Welcome to FoodMark
mainpagecard.subtitle: your universal portal for ordering dishes from the best restaurants in the city!
mainpagecard.text: On our site you will find a wide selection of culinary delights from local eateries to fine dining restaurants. 'FoodMark' offers a convenient and fast way to enjoy your favorite dishes without leaving home.
mainpagecard.subheader-title-1: 1. Select a restaurant from the list or search by cuisine, dish or area.
mainpagecard.subheader-title-2: 2. Browse the menu and add the desired dishes to your cart.
mainpagecard.subheader-title-3: 3. Place your order by indicating your delivery address and preferred time.
mainpagecard.subheader-title-4: 4. Pay online through our secure payment system.
mainpagecard.subheader-title-5: 5. Track the status of your order in real time.
mainpagecard.subheader-2-title-1: A wide range of: from pizza and sushi to dietary and vegetarian dishes.
mainpagecard.subheader-2-title-2: Flexibility: possibility of ordering now or pre-ordering.
mainpagecard.subheader-2-title-3: Bonus program: accumulate points and get discounts on your next orders.
mainpagecard.subheader-2-title-4: 24/7 support: our operators are always ready to help you with your choice or placing an order.
